languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы можете позаботиться о себе сами. Все силы арбитров направлены на подавление бунта — мы не сможем оказать вам поддержку".
"I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы можете позаботиться о себе сами. Все силы арбитров направлены на подавление бунта — мы не сможем оказать вам поддержку".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you can take care of yourselves. The Arbitrators are all committed to quelling the riot, we will not be able to support you."
"I hope you can take care of yourselves. The Arbitrators are all committed to quelling the riot, we will not be able to support you."
"I hope you can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."
"I hope you can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."
"I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."
"I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr und Euer Gefolge könnt auf Euch aufpassen. Alle Arbitratoren sind mit der Niederschlagung des Aufstandes beschäftigt. Wir werden Euch nicht unterstützen können."
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr und Euer Gefolge könnt auf Euch aufpassen. Alle Arbitratoren sind mit der Niederschlagung des Aufstandes beschäftigt. Wir werden Euch nicht unterstützen können."

languages.text: « J'espère que votre entourage et vous pourrez vous en sortir seuls. Tous les arbitrators sont actuellement occupés à étouffer la révolte. Nous ne pourrons pas vous venir en aide. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que votre entourage et vous pourrez vous en sortir seuls. Tous les arbitrators sont actuellement occupés à étouffer la révolte. Nous ne pourrons pas vous venir en aide. »

languages.text: 「あなたと随行者の皆さんがご自分の身を守れることを願っています。アービトレイターは全員、暴動の鎮圧に忙しく、援護はできないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたと随行者の皆さんがご自分の身を守れることを願っています。アービトレイターは全員、暴動の鎮圧に忙しく、援護はできないでしょう」

languages.text: «Espero que usted y su séquito puedan cuidarse. Todos los Arbitrator estamos ocupados sofocando la revuelta; no podemos ayudarles».
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que usted y su séquito puedan cuidarse. Todos los Arbitrator estamos ocupados sofocando la revuelta; no podemos ayudarles».

languages.text: “我希望你和你的随行人员能保护好自己。所有法务官目前都在忙着平息暴乱，无法为你提供增援。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: “我希望你和你的随行人员能保护好自己。所有法务官目前都在忙着平息暴乱，无法为你提供增援。”

languages.text: "Umarım siz ve maiyetiniz başınızın çaresine bakabilirsiniz. Yargıcıların hepsi isyanı bastırmakla meşgul. Size destek olamayacağız."
languages.original_text: "I hope you and your retinue can take care of yourselves. All the Arbitrators are busy quelling the riot. We will not be able to support you."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım siz ve maiyetiniz başınızın çaresine bakabilirsiniz. Yargıcıların hepsi isyanı bastırmakla meşgul. Size destek olamayacağız."
